Severe Market Downturn.description: A significant decline in major stock markets, affecting asset values and investment portfolios.

Major Regulatory Change.description: Implementation of new, stringent financial regulations affecting capital requirements and reporting standards.
potential_effects: Potential restructuring of certain business lines

Global Economic Recession.description: A prolonged period of economic decline affecting multiple countries and sectors.
potential_effects: Decreased consumer spending and business investment

Major Cybersecurity Breach.description: A large-scale cyber attack compromising sensitive customer data and critical systems.
potential_effects: Financial losses from theft or fraud

Significant Interest Rate Change.description: A sudden and substantial change in interest rates by central banks.
potential_effects: Shifts in consumer borrowing and saving behavior
Potential impact on currency exchange rates

Natural Disaster or Pandemic.description: A major natural disaster or global health crisis affecting multiple regions.
potential_effects: Changes in consumer behavior and spending patterns

Liquidity Crisis.description: A sudden shortage of cash or easily convertible assets in the financial system.
